title: Refuel, An Easier Way for SOL Transactions in the Phantom Wallet
description:
One of the perennial challenges faced by users of blockchain networks is ensuring they have an adequate balance of tokens to cover transaction fees. This requirement often leads to users needing to manage and maintain a minimum balance of tokens in their wallets. Creating an additional layer of complexity. Enter Refuel: Automating Transaction Fee Coverage […]

The post Refuel, An Easier Way for SOL Transactions in the Phantom Wallet appeared first on Altcoin Buzz.

title: Cosmos’ ATOM Inflation Rate Reduction Proposal Receives Green Signal
description:
According to recent reports, the Cosmos community has agreed with the proposal to reduce ATOM’s inflation rate to 10%, with a majority of 41.1% supporting the scheme. The proposal intends to limit the inflation rate of ATOM from 14% to 10%, which in turn brings the Staking APR from 19% to 13.4%. Chinese crypto reporter […]

The post Cosmos’ ATOM Inflation Rate Reduction Proposal Receives Green Signal appeared first on Coin Edition.
